hero.title: We Transform
hero.description: At GDN PRO we create innovative digital solutions. World-class web development, mobile apps and digital marketing.

about.title: About GDN Pro
about.description1: We are a digital consulting company specialized in transforming ideas into innovative technological solutions. With more than 2 years of experience, we have helped companies of all sizes to digitalize their processes and achieve their objectives.
about.description2: Our comprehensive approach combines high-quality software development, effective digital marketing strategies and access to a network of specialized freelancers to cover all your digital needs.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer complete solutions to boost your business in the digital world

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: We design and develop modern, fast and scalable websites and web applications. Perfect for companies looking for a solid online presence and performance.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.description: We create native and hybrid mobile applications with excellent performance and a smooth user experience, ready to publish on App Store and Google Play.
features: Design adapted to iOS and Android

digitalMarketing.title: Digital Marketing
digitalMarketing.description: Increase your visibility, traffic and sales with effective digital strategies, adapted to your business. We focus on measurable results.

freelancerNetwork.title: Freelancer Network
freelancerNetwork.description: Access the best freelance talent for any type of project. We take care of selection, management and quality of work.

cta.title: Need a custom solution?
cta.description: Every project is unique. Let's talk about your specific needs and create the perfect solution for you.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Some of the successful projects we have developed for our clients

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate professionals who make every successful project possible

genderson.bio: Passionate about technological innovation, with over 8 years of experience developing and leading full-stack solutions, pentesting, and digital transformation.

junior.bio: Brings financial and accounting knowledge, and an analytical perspective to the business to make decisions that minimize risks and maximize benefits.

rikelvi.bio: Full-stack developer specialized in React Native and Astro with over 50 published apps.

cta.title: Want to be part of our team?
cta.description: We are always looking for exceptional talent to join our network of specialized freelancers

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Our clients' satisfaction is our best calling card

cta.title: Ready to transform your business?
cta.description: Don't wait any longer. Let's start building your company's digital future today. Our team is ready to make your most ambitious ideas come true.

seo.title: GDN Pro
seo.description: GDN Pro is a platform where freelance developers and clients looking for workers meet and reach corporate agreements. At GDN PRO we create innovative digital solutions. World-class web development, mobile apps and digital marketing.

commitment.title: Commitment to Your Privacy
commitment.description: At GDN Pro, we respect and protect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information when you use our services.

personal.title: 1.1 Personal Information
items: Full name and contact information (email, phone)

items.services: Service provision: Web development, mobile applications and digital marketing
items.communication: Communication: Respond to inquiries, send project updates
items.billing: Billing: Process payments and generate invoices
items.improvement: Service improvement: Analyze usage and optimize our platform
items.marketing: Marketing: Send relevant information (only with your consent)
items.legal: Legal compliance: Comply with legal and tax obligations

section3.title: 3. Sharing Information
section3.subtitle: When We Share Your Information

items.providers: Service providers: Companies that help us operate (hosting, payments, email)
items.freelancers: Freelancers: Only information necessary to execute your project
items.legal: Legal requirements: When required by law or authorities
items.transfer: Business transfer: In case of merger, acquisition or sale

section3.neverSell: We never sell your personal information to third parties for commercial purposes.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.subtitle: Rights Over Your Data

rights.access: Access: Request a copy of your data
rights.portability: Portability: Transfer data to another provider

section5.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:

essential.title: üç™ Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the basic functioning of the website.

analytics.title: üìä Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how users interact with our site.

marketing.title: üéØ Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to show relevant ads (only with your consent).

items.active: Active client data: During the business relationship
items.marketing: Marketing data: Until consent is revoked

section8.title: 8. International Transfers
section8.description: Some of our service providers may be located in different countries. In these cases, we ensure that:
items: The same level of protection is maintained

section9.title: 9. Minors
section9.subtitle: Protection of Minors
section9.description: Our services are aimed at businesses and professionals. We do not intentionally collect information from minors under 18 years of age. If we detect that we have collected data from a minor, we will delete it immediately.

section10.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
section10.description: We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through:

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.addressValue: Headquarters: Newark, DE (USA) ‚Äî Soon to relocate to Tallinn, Estonia (EU)

footer.compliance: This Privacy Policy complies with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (LFPDPPP) and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

agreement.title: Service Agreement
agreement.description: By using GDN Pro services, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

definitions.gdnpro: "GDN Pro", "we", "our": Refers to the service provider company
definitions.client: "Client", "you", "your": Refers to the person or entity that contracts our services
definitions.services: "Services": Web development, mobile applications, digital marketing and related services
definitions.project: "Project": Specific work agreed between the parties
definitions.freelancer: "Freelancer": Independent professional who is part of our network

freelancers.title: Freelancer Network
freelancers.description: We connect clients with specialized freelancers for specific projects, acting as intermediaries and guaranteeing service quality.

items.information: Complete information: Provide all data necessary for the project
items.content: Content: Supply texts, images and required materials
items.feedback: Timely feedback: Review and approve deliveries within agreed times
items.payments: Timely payments: Make payments according to established schedule
items.access: Necessary access: Provide hosting credentials, domains, etc.
items.decisions: Decisions: Make project decisions in a timely manner

items.quality: Professional quality: Deliver high-quality technical work
items.communication: Regular communication: Keep informed about progress
items.support: Technical support: Provide assistance during development

items.partial: Partial payments: According to project milestones
items.final: Final payment: Upon completion and delivery

latePayment.title: Late Payment Policy
latePayment.description: In case of payment delays, we reserve the right to:
items: Retain deliverables until payments are regularized

clientRights.title: Client Rights
clientRights.description: Once full payment is completed, the client obtains:
items: Full use rights of developed code
Ownership of provided content and materials

reservedRights.title: Rights Reserved by GDN Pro
items: Right to show project in portfolio

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Licenses
thirdParty.description: Some components may be subject to third-party licenses. The client is responsible for complying with these licenses in the use of the final product.

maintenance.title: Additional Maintenance
maintenance.description: Continuous maintenance, content updates and new features are available under separate contracts with preferential rates.

limitations.title: Liability Limitations
items: We are not responsible for client data losses
We do not guarantee specific marketing results
We are not responsible for content provided by the client
Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the project
We do not cover indirect damages or lost profits

items.during: During development: Payment for completed work
items.partial: Partial delivery: According to progress percentage
items.penalty: Penalty: 20% for cancellation without justified cause

termination.title: Termination for Non-Compliance
termination.description: We may terminate the contract immediately if:
items: Client does not make agreed payments

section11.title: 11. Confidentiality
section11.subtitle: Confidentiality Commitment
section11.description: We commit to maintaining the confidentiality of:
items: Personal data according to our privacy policy
section11.duration: Duration: This obligation remains in effect during and after the business relationship, without time limit.

steps.1: Direct negotiation: Attempt to resolve amicably
steps.4: Jurisdiction: Courts of the corresponding City

law.title: Applicable Law
law.description: These terms are governed by applicable laws. Any dispute will be resolved in competent courts.

section13.title: 13. Modifications
section13.subtitle: Changes to Terms
section13.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms. Changes will be notified:
section13.acceptance: Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

general.title: General Data
general.addressValue: Headquarters: Newark, DE (USA) ‚Äî Soon to relocate to Tallinn, Estonia (EU)

fiscal.title: Tax Data
fiscal.regimeValue: LLC (Delaware, USA) ‚Äî Soon O√ú (Private Limited Company) in Estonia (EU)

footer.compliance: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between the client and GDN Pro for the provision of digital development services.

dataDeletion.title: User Data Deletion
dataDeletion.subtitle: Request deletion of your personal data from our systems

right.title: Right to Data Deletion
right.description: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data from our systems. This process is irreversible and may affect access to certain services.

form.title: Deletion Request Form

fields.name: Full Name *
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Specifically describe what data you want to delete and why...
fields.descriptionHint: Specify what data you want to delete and the reason
fields.verificationPlaceholder: Last 4 digits of your registered phone
fields.verificationHint: To verify your identity, provide additional information you have registered with us

important.title: Important:
items: Data deletion is an irreversible process
May affect your access to services and active projects
The process may take up to 30 business days
Some data must be retained due to legal obligations

form.confirmation: By submitting this request, you confirm that you understand the consequences of data deletion.
form.success: Request submitted successfully. We will contact you within 24-48 hours to process your request.

footer.compliance: This process complies with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (LFPDPPP) and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
footer.moreInfo: For more information, consult our Privacy Policy
